'''Uncle Yun'''{{Lang|zh=云叔|zh_rm=Yún-shū}} is a quest-exclusive [[NPC]] that appears in the [[Teyvat]] storyline [[Archon Quests]], Chapter II, Prologue: [[Autumn Winds, Scarlet Leaves]].

==Profile==
<!-- detailed story/lore information goes here -->
He is one of the competitors in [[The Crux Clash]]. He was eliminated in the third round by [[Fei the Flyer]]. Later, he stays as a spectator for the rest of the tournament.
